  • [r2248] src/code/system/CeylanFIFO.cc, src/code/system/CeylanFIFO.h, test/cross-tests/testCeylanFIFO.arm7.c, test/cross-tests/testCeylanFIFO.arm9.cc One of the worst bug I ever committed solved after countless hours wasted: in ARM7 code, definition of variables modified in IRQ were not volatile, hence the compiler optimized them away wrongly. So 'ARM7StatusWord volatile * statusWordPointer = 0 ;' had to be actually 'ARM7StatusWord volatile * volatile statusWordPointer = 0 ;'...
  • 2007-11-12 07:42 wondersye
